name: Space Rocks (itch) (jonsilva)
description:
Space Rocks ( small game )

Features:

  • Typical space Rocks game
  • 5 Levels
  • 3 bosses + 1 end game boss
  • Cash system and Score
  • Shop
  • Inventory
  • Customizable Airplane + Weapons

Take on an adventure to quickly escape a Crumbling Planet, and find out the source of this disaster.
